room_title: Escape room "Deadbeard's Revenge" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: We were a group of 8 and had booked the entire mission. We did end up solving it and we had a blast! Our mission support was Dan and he was the MAN! His instructions were clear and his timely clues/hints helped make this awesome experience even better. We look forward to going back again and experiencing the other escape rooms that they have.

room_title: Escape room "Deadbeard's Revenge" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: Our group only had positive things to say after our escape. The staff was super fun and entertaining. I would totally recommend Ninja Escape!

room_title: Escape room "Deadbeard's Revenge" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: We had a birthday party with 10 11-year-old kids. They loved it! They did the Captain Deadbeard's Revenge room. They weren't able to solve all the puzzles but had a great time anyway! Jake was fantastic! Handled the kids like a bawse!
